about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy a sensual story while completing tricky puzzles!
Connect the numbers sequentially, using all of the squares on the board
After completing a puzzle, you will unlock a sexy new image and the next part of the story!
Can you complete every puzzle and meet all of the nurses?!

Story Background

There is a clinic in a back alley in this city that claims to be able to cure all ailments, and do so in a pleasant way...
Nurses here use sex therapy to treat patients, using special pleasure medicine and secret treatment techniques.
You heard the rumors about the clinic and came to see for yourself.
What will happen there?

Characters

Mengiru:

The receptionist at the mysterious clinic has pink hair and an attractive figure.
She helps you before a formal diagnosis is made.

Jousen:

She is the assistant of the attending physician. She has short blond hair and a beautiful face.
She gives you a very comfortable treatment!

Serura:

The attending nurse who will diagnose and treat you during your stay.
She uses very specific sex treatments that will make you feel great!

Features

  • A fantastical erotic story with nurses who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy and erotic images of beautiful nurses.
  • You can skip the puzzles if you just want to enjoy the story. (Press Enter during a puzzle).
  • CG Gallery mode. (Click the left and right buttons next to the CG after completing a puzzle).

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
